about.summary: Bayesian model averaging for linear models with a wide choice of (customizable) priors. Built-in priors include coefficient priors (fixed, flexible and hyper-g priors), 5 kinds of model priors, moreover model sampling by enumeration or various MCMC approaches. Post-processing functions allow for inferring posterior inclusion and model probabilities, various moments, coefficient and predictive densities. Plotting functions available for posterior model size, MCMC convergence, predictive and coefficient densities, best models representation, BMA comparison.

Bayesian model averaging for linear models with a wide choice of (customizable) priors. Built-in priors include coefficient priors (fixed, flexible and hyper-g priors), 5 kinds of model priors, moreover model sampling by enumeration or various MCMC approaches. Post-processing functions allow for inferring posterior inclusion and model probabilities, various moments, coefficient and predictive densities. Plotting functions available for posterior model size, MCMC convergence, predictive and coefficient densities, best models representation, BMA comparison.

name: r-bms
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.3.4' %}

{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-bms
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/BMS_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/BMS/BMS_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 14f340f038fc8eadec694457f896c89a4b02ec845aad360172f0bad07a98757c

build:
  merge_build_host: True  # [win]
  number: 0
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
    - cross-r-base {{ r_base }}    # [build_platform != target_platform]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('BMS')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('BMS')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://bms.zeugner.eu/

  license: Artistic-2.0
  summary: Bayesian model averaging for linear models with a wide choice of (customizable) priors.
    Built-in priors include coefficient priors (fixed, flexible and hyper-g priors),
    5 kinds of model priors, moreover model sampling by enumeration or various MCMC
    approaches. Post-processing functions allow for inferring posterior inclusion and
    model probabilities, various moments, coefficient and predictive densities. Plotting
    functions available for posterior model size, MCMC convergence, predictive and coefficient
    densities, best models representation, BMA comparison.

  license_family: OTHER
  license_file:
    - '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/Artistic-2.0'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - izahn
